message:
Aerial Robotics Kharagpur (ARK) participated in its second International Aerial Robotics Competition (IARC), in Beijing.The International Aerial Robotics Competition is the longest running collegiate aerial robotics challenge in the world. This time, team ARK performed remarkably better, grabbing the "Most Innovative Design Award" for their hexacopter named 'Falcon'.

To know more about the competition and ARK's performance read our blog-

http://wp.me/p7L0xP-6C

For all the IOT curious minds, here is your chance to meet and interact with Prof. Jeremy Watson, Chief Scientist at BRE. He will be delivering an IEEE Institute Lecture on "Petras a Research Hub for Cyber Security of the Internet of Things". He is the president of the Institution of Engineering and Technology, the largest multidisciplinary professional engineering institution in the world. 
Here are the details:
Date: 11th Sept., 2017 (Monday)
Venue: Maitrayee Auditorum
Time: 5 PM

FT BLOG SERIES #201
International Relations Cell presents you with FT Blog Series wherein we share the experiences of several Kgpians who went on a Foreign Training in their past summers. We encourage everyone to go through it and find the perks of going on an FT. We advise everyone to have at least one global experience during their stay at this beautiful campus. We thank Alok Anand Patra for the insights given. 
https://ircell.wordpress.com/2017/09/05/ft-interview-series-alok-anand-patra/

This is to inform that the dates of the 24H Chrono Entrepreneurship Challenge, India 2017 have been changed to 1-2 December of 2017, IISER Pune. We encourage all the Masters and PhD students of IIT Kharagpur to take part in it. Please contact Mrs. Alivia Nag, International Relations Executive at the Office of International Relations for details related to application.

The Nobel Prize is widely considered the world's most prestigious award. Ever wondered how a Nobel Laureate is selected? How the process is designed? What distinguishes someone to win a Nobel Prize? Do you want to know more about the history and future of the Nobel Prize? Here's your chance!!! Institute Lecture by Prof. Sven Lidin on "The History and Future of the Nobel Prize"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a9RqplcrbMg

A Foreign Training and Research Talk was conducted by International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur. The talk witnessed enthusiastic students from all the departments. The panelists informed them about the general procedure to apply for a Foreign Training and told them about various programs. We wish best of luck to all the students applying for a Foreign Training this year!
story: International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur added 12 new photos — with Gyan Darshan and 8 others.

message:
It's an honour for us to meet the ex-chairman of the Nobel Prize Committee. We present you the excerpts from our discussion with Prof. Sven Lidin. It was an inspiring and engaging discussion where Prof. Lidin went to great length to describe what sets one apart, what is considered as world class research, how one can do great work and simply put: how one can get a Nobel Prize. He also talked about how India is rising and how Indians are contributing to research across the world. We encourage each and everyone to go through the interview description and get inspired.
https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6309412728322781184/

International Relations Cell,  IIT Kharagpur presents Foreign Training and Research Talk for all those aspirants who dream to work abroad in a foreign university on a Summer Project.
Do not miss this chance of interacting with students from 3rd and 4th year who interned in various prestigious Universities last summer.
Tuesday, 29th August, 6:30 pm, V2
Date: 06:30PM
Time: 29-08-2017
Veunu: V2, Vikramshila

Guest Lecture by Dr. Larry Nagahara

Title of Talk: Convergence of Physical Systems and Engineering Perspectives in Biomedicine: Innovative ways to fight Cancer

Guest Lecture by Dr. Larry Nagahara

Title of Talk: Convergence of Physical Systems and Engineering Perspectives in Biomedicine: Innovative ways to fight Cancer

Professor Sven Lidin, Head, Department of Chemistry, Lund University, was the Chairman of Nobel Committee for Chemistry 2014. He is delivering a lecture on a very intriguing topic 'The History and Future of the Nobel Prize' in IIT Kharagpur.
The details of the guest lecture are as follows:
Date: 25th August, 2017
Venue: Kalidas Auditorium
Time: 5:30 pm

On this auspicious occasion of the 67th Foundation Day of IIT Kharagpur, we convey our best wishes to every Kgpian across the world. In 66 years we came this far. We believe IIT Kharagpur will continue to inspire each and every one for all the glorious years ahead and play a constructive role in building a new and strong India. 66 years till now, in our hearts forever <3

Attn:   "All Master and PhD students of IIT Kharagpur"

Are you inspired to make an impact on the world? Do you  
believe all that it takes for a change is a great idea and an indomitable belief in it? If yes, here is a challenge for you:   An Indo-French "24H Chrono Entrepreneurship Challenge-India"!

A 24 hour challenge wherein 8 teams of 7 students each will elaborate a business model of enterprise/start-up, based on an innovative concept/product at IISER PUNE!

All Master and PhD students of IIT Kharagpur are encouraged to participate in this life changing challenge and get the best out of it. An official e-mail has been circulated among the students with all the details about the event.  

Hurry!!! Last date to apply : 22.09.2017

Interested  to know more ????  Please contact us through an email or call us at the earliest...

1.  Mrs. Alivia Nag, International Relations Executive, Office of 
     International Relations
     +91 3222-281068 (O) | alivia.nag@adm.iitkgp.ernet.in

2.  Raj Kolamuri, General Secretary, International Relations Cell
     9932190911 | raj1kolamuri@gmail.com

Hello, UG 2nd year and PG, MBA, LLB 1st year students!

International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur is recruiting Student Members, Design Team Members, and Web Team Members.

Want to be part of this amazing team working hard to take KGP to new horizons?

Then register yourself at- www.tinyurl.com/ircselections

Deadline of application- 28th July 2017 till midnight

To know more about us, visit our website- http://www.ircell.iitkgp.ac.in/
